Trigger You are about to roll initiative.

You have a premonition about impending danger that you use to warn your allies. Each ally within 20 feet gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll and gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, which last for 1 minute. If you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Cursebound]{Cursebound 2} when you use Oracular Warning, the bonus increases to +3, and if you are cursebound 3, the bonus increases to +4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Oracular Warning]
